titlePromo:{fontSize:18,textAlign:'center',color:Colors.white,fontFamily:'Nexa Slab xBold',fontWeight:'bold'},namePromo:{fontSize:36,textAlign:'center',color:Colors.white,fontFamily:'Nexa Slab xBold',fontWeight:'bold'},restrictionPromo:{fontSize:15,textAlign:'center',color:Colors.white,fontFamily:'Hk Grotesk Medium'},restrictionPromoSm:{fontSize:13,textAlign:'center',color:Colors.white,fontFamily:'Hk Grotesk Medium'},seeMenu:{fontSize:10,textAlign:'center',color:Colors.white,fontFamily:'Hk Grotesk Bold',fontWeight:'bold',textTransform:'uppercase'},// Menu & content
